Helper for Text 19.0.2: rewrite the mixed system as a finite intersection of half-spaces.

lemma helperForText_19_0_2_solutionSet_as_iInter_halfspaces (n m k : ) (a : Fin m Fin n ) ( : Fin m ) (b : Fin k Fin n ) ( : Fin k ) : {x : Fin n | ( i, x a i = i) ( j, x b j j)} = s : Sum (Fin m) (Sum (Fin m) (Fin k)), closedHalfSpaceLE n (match s with | Sum.inl i => a i | Sum.inr s' => match s' with | Sum.inl i => -a i | Sum.inr j => b j) (match s with | Sum.inl i => i | Sum.inr s' => match s' with | Sum.inl i => - i | Sum.inr j => j) := by ext x constructor intro hx have hx' : ( i, x a i = i) ( j, x b j j) := by simpa using hx simp [closedHalfSpaceLE] refine ?_, ?_ intro i exact le_of_eq (hx'.1 i) refine ?_, ?_ intro i exact le_of_eq (hx'.1 i).symm intro j exact hx'.2 j intro hx have hx' : ( i, x a i i) ( i, i x a i) ( j, x b j j) := by simpa [closedHalfSpaceLE] using hx simp refine ?_, ?_ intro i exact le_antisymm (hx'.1 i) (hx'.2.1 i) intro j exact hx'.2.2 j

Helper for Theorem 19.1: a relative-interior point lies in the set.

Text 19.0.7: Every face of a polyhedral convex set is itself a polyhedral convex set.

theorem polyhedralConvexSet_face (n : ) (C F : Set (Fin n )) : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n C IsFace ( := ) C F Convex F IsPolyhedralConvexSet n F := by intro hpoly hface hconvF by_cases hFempty : F = simpa [hFempty] using helperForText_19_0_7_polyhedral_empty n have hFne : F.Nonempty := Set.nonempty_iff_ne_empty.2 hFempty rcases helperForText_19_0_7_exists_mem_euclideanRelativeInterior_fin_of_convex_nonempty (hconvF := hconvF) hFne with z, hzri have hzF : z F := helperForTheorem_19_1_mem_of_euclideanRelativeInterior_fin (n := n) (C := F) hzri have hzC : z C := hface.2.subset hzF rcases (isPolyhedralConvexSet_iff_exists_finite_halfspaces n C).1 hpoly with m, b, , hC let A : Set (Fin m) := {i : Fin m | z b i = i} have hsubset : F C i A, {x : Fin n | x b i = i} := by simpa [A] using (helperForTheorem_19_1_face_subset_iInter_tightConstraints_of_mem_ri (n := n) (C := C) (F := F) (b := b) ( := ) hC hface hzri hzC) have hsuperset : C i A, {x : Fin n | x b i = i} F := by simpa [A] using (helperForTheorem_19_1_face_eq_iInter_tightConstraints_of_mem_ri (n := n) (C := C) (F := F) (b := b) ( := ) hC hface hzri hzC) have hEqF : F = C i A, {x : Fin n | x b i = i} := Set.Subset.antisymm hsubset hsuperset have hpolyActive : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n (( j : Fin m, closedHalfSpaceLE n (b j) ( j)) i A, {x : Fin n | x b i = i}) := by exact helperForText_19_0_7_activeConstraintIntersection_isPolyhedral (n := n) (m := m) b A have hpolyF : IsPolyhedralConvexSet n (C i A, {x : Fin n | x b i = i}) := by simpa [hC] using hpolyActive simpa [hEqF] using hpolyF

Helper for Theorem 19.1: finite faces yield finitely many extreme points.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_1_finiteFaces_imp_finite_extremePoints {n : } {C : Set (Fin n )} (hc : Convex C) : {F : Set (Fin n ) | IsFace ( := ) C F}.Finite Set.Finite {x : Fin n | IsExtremePoint ( := ) C x} := by classical intro hfaces let f : (Fin n ) Set (Fin n ) := fun x => {x} have hm : Set.MapsTo f {x : Fin n | IsExtremePoint ( := ) C x} {F : Set (Fin n ) | IsFace ( := ) C F} := by intro x hx have hface : IsFace ( := ) C ({x} : Set (Fin n )) := by have hx' : Convex C IsExtremePoint ( := ) C x := by exact hc, hx exact (isFace_singleton_iff_isExtremePoint ( := ) (C := C) x).2 hx' simpa [f] using hface have hinj : Set.InjOn f {x : Fin n | IsExtremePoint ( := ) C x} := by intro x hx y hy hxy have hxmem : x ({x} : Set (Fin n )) := by simp have hxmem' : x ({y} : Set (Fin n )) := by simpa [f, hxy] using hxmem simpa using hxmem' exact Set.Finite.of_injOn hm hinj hfaces
